title: Greenland’s melting ice and landslide-prone fjords make the oil and minerals Trump is eyeing dangerous to extract
description: Melting ice, thawing permafrost and crumbling fjord walls are just a few of the risks climate change poses for those living and working in Greenland.
content: Since Donald Trump regained the U.S. presidency, he has talked about taking over Greenland. He has insisted that the U.S. will control the island, currently an autonomous territory of Denmark, and th… [+8138 chars]
de: Das schmelzende Eis Grönlands und die erdrutschgefährdeten Fjorde machen die Förderung von Öl und Mineralien, die Trump anstrebt, gefährlich. Schmelzendes Eis, auftauender Permafrost und bröckelnde Fjordmauern sind nur einige der Risiken, die der Klimawandel für die Menschen mit sich bringt, die in Grönland leben und arbeiten.
en: Greenland’s melting ice and landslide-prone fjords make the oil and minerals Trump is eyeing dangerous to extract. Melting ice, thawing permafrost and crumbling fjord walls are just a few of the risks climate change poses for those living and working in Greenland.
la: Groenlandiae glaciem liquefactionem et fjords landli-proni faciunt, oleum et mineralia Trump periculosum extractum inspicit. Glacies liquescens, tabidaque permafrost et parietum putridum fjord sunt pauci periculorum mutationis climatis illis in Groenlandia viventibus et operantibus.

title: Deadly mine landslide case set for key hearing
description: A court is set to convene on Jan. 6 for the fifth hearing in the criminal case regarding a 2024 landslide at a gold mine that killed nine workers in the eastern city of Erzincan's İliç district.
content:

A court is set to convene on Jan. 6 for the fifth hearing in the criminal case regarding a 2024 landslide at a gold mine that killed nine workers in the eastern city of Erzincan's liç distri… [+1452 chars]
de: Der Fall eines tödlichen Erdrutschs in einer Mine steht vor einer wichtigen Anhörung. Am 6. Januar soll ein Gericht zur fünften Anhörung im Strafverfahren zu einem Erdrutsch in einer Goldmine im Jahr 2024 zusammentreten, bei dem neun Arbeiter im Bezirk İliç der östlichen Stadt Erzincan ums Leben kamen.
en: Deadly mine landslide case set for key hearing. A court is set to convene on Jan. 6 for the fifth hearing in the criminal case regarding a 2024 landslide at a gold mine that killed nine workers in the eastern city of Erzincan's İliç district.

title: Effect of suction stress on the strength of rupture zone and stability of landslide
description: The variation in moisture content and suction stress within rupture zone soils, caused by fluctuations in rainfall and groundwater levels, is critical to landslide stability. In this study, undisturbed rupture zone soil samples were collected from the drainag…
content:
• Sassa, K., Fukuoka, H., Wang, G. & Ishikawa, N. Undrained dynamic-loading ring-shear apparatus and its application to landslide dynamics. Landslides1, 719 (2004). Google Scholar 
  • T… [+8491 chars]
de: Einfluss der Sogspannung auf die Stärke der Bruchzone und die Stabilität von Erdrutschen. Die durch Schwankungen des Niederschlags und des Grundwasserspiegels verursachten Schwankungen des Feuchtigkeitsgehalts und der Sogspannung innerhalb von Bruchzonenböden sind für die Stabilität von Erdrutschen von entscheidender Bedeutung. In dieser Studie wurden ungestörte Bruchzonen-Bodenproben aus der Entwässerungsanlage entnommen.
en: Effect of suction stress on the strength of rupture zone and stability of landslide. The variation in moisture content and suction stress within rupture zone soils, caused by fluctuations in rainfall and groundwater levels, is critical to landslide stability. In this study, undisturbed rupture zone soil samples were collected from the drainag…
la: Effectus suctionis vis in zona rupturae robur et stabilitas proruit. Variatio contenti umoris et suctionis accentus intra zonam rupturam terrae, per fluctuationes in imbribus et campis aquae fundatae, est critica ad stabilitatem prolabi. In hoc studio, zona soli inconvulsa ruptura exempla ex drainag collecta sunt.

IPOH: In der Nähe von Teluk Akuan in Manjung finden derzeit keine Holzeinschlags- oder Steinbruchaktivitäten statt, und die gemeldete Verschmutzung wurde durch einen Erdrutsch im Abraumbereich eines alten Steinbruchs nach ungewöhnlich starkem Regen verursacht. Lesen Sie die ganze Geschichte
en: Pollution at Teluk Akuan due to landslide, not quarry and logging, says Perak exco member. IPOH: No logging or quarry activities are currently taking place near Teluk Akuan in Manjung, and the reported pollution was caused by a landslide at the overburden area of an old quarry following unusually heavy rain. Read full story
la: Pollutio ad Teluk Akuan ob ruinam, non fossuram et colligationem, membrum excorio dicit Perak. IPOH: Nullae operationes logging vel praedae apud Teluk Akuan in Manjung nunc fiunt, et relatio pollutionis facta est ex ruina in area oneris veteris praedae sequentis pluviae solitae. Read full story

title: California’s Highway 1 Fully Opens Through Big Sur Years After Major Landslides
description: The reopening of the Regent’s Slide section came nearly 80 days ahead of schedule, restoring the full coastal connection between Carmel and Cambria.
content:
Perlmutter added that the early opening is particularly vital for the upcoming summer season, as visitors typically begin making their travel arrangements months in advance.

de: Kaliforniens Highway 1 wird Jahre nach großen Erdrutschen durch Big Sur vollständig freigegeben. Die Wiedereröffnung des Regent’s Slide-Abschnitts erfolgte fast 80 Tage früher als geplant und stellte die vollständige Küstenverbindung zwischen Carmel und Cambria wieder her.
en: California’s Highway 1 Fully Opens Through Big Sur Years After Major Landslides. The reopening of the Regent’s Slide section came nearly 80 days ahead of schedule, restoring the full coastal connection between Carmel and Cambria.
la: California's Highway 1 Fullly Opens Through Big Sur Years After Major Landslides. Retectio sectionis Slide Proregis venit ante annos fere LXXX, plenam nexum maritimam inter Carmelum et Cambriam restituens.
